trans-unit.source:
Size
Define the size of the button that opens the modal.
(Default: Tiny)

No overlay
If you activate this option, then modal will no longer have the dark background while it is activated.

No animation
If you activate this option, then the modal will open without an animation

Animation in
Define the animation that the modal should apply when it is opening.

Animation out
Define the animation that the modal should apply when it is closing.

Animation speed in
Define the duration of the animation when the modal is opening

Animation speed out
Define the duration of the animation when the modal is closing

Show Delay
Time, in ms, to delay the opening of a modal after a click if no animation used.

Hide Delay
Time, in ms, to delay the closing of a modal after a click if no animation used.

Close on click
If you activate this option, then the modal will no longer close when pressing somewhere inside the website.

close on esc
If you activate this option, then the modal will no longer close when pressing ESC.

V-Offset
Distance, in pixels, the modal should push down from the top of the screen.
(Default: auto)

H-Offset
Distance, in pixels, the modal should push in from the side of the screen.
(Default: auto)

Reset on close
Allows the modal to remove and reinject markup on close. Should be true if using video elements w/o using provider's api, otherwise, videos will continue to play in the background.
